price: Enyi mlio amini! Takeni msaada kwa subira na Swala. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu yu pamoja na wanao subiri.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: Na tafuteni kujisaidia, enyi Waumini, katika kila linalo kupateni, kwa kusubiri na kushika Swala. Swala ndio msingi wa ibada zote. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu kwa uwezo wake wenye nguvu yu pamoja na wanao subiri. Yeye ndiye mlinzi wao, na Yeye ndiye anaye wanusuru daima.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
